tool_description: Fast and straightforward API to retrieve a random sequence of characters!
name: Randomizer
title: Randomizer

api_list.name: getRandom
api_list.description: Retrieve a random sequence of characters matching the provided query attributes

optional_parameters.name: case
optional_parameters.description: Force sequence to match case argument

optional_parameters.name: extra
optional_parameters.description:
